name: Basic Seasoning Blend

instructions.en: Measure out all the ingredients into a small mixing bowl.
instructions.sk: Odmerajte všetky prísady do malej misky na miešanie.
instructions.ja: すべての材料を小さなボウルに計量して入れます。

instructions.en: Whisk or stir all ingredients together until well combined.
instructions.sk: Vyšľahajte alebo premiešajte všetky prísady, až kým sa dobre nespoja.
instructions.ja: 全ての材料がよく混ざるまで泡立て器や箸でかき混ぜます。

notes: This Basic Seasoning Blend is a versatile, keto-friendly spice mix that can be used to enhance the flavor of various dishes without adding carbs. It's perfect for seasoning meats, vegetables, eggs, and other keto-friendly foods. The blend of salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder provides a well-rounded flavor profile that complements a wide range of recipes. This seasoning is ideal for those following a ketogenic diet as it contains no added sugars or carbs. For the best results, use fresh, high-quality spices. This seasoning mix can be stored in an airtight container in a cool, dry place for up to 6 months. To use, simply sprinkle over your food before or during cooking. Remember that this blend contains a significant amount of salt, so adjust the quantity used based on your dietary needs and taste preferences. You can also customize this blend by adding other keto-friendly spices like paprika, cayenne pepper, or dried herbs to suit your taste.
